Maze

Class InputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze.InputHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, MoveHandler

    public class InputHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, MoveHandler
    This class handles the input events, mainly, key press and release events. The input handler must meet the specification outlined by the MoveHandler, thus it implements the MoveHandler interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean moveDown
      Boolean that represents downward movement which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the down arrow key.
      private boolean moveLeft
      Boolean that represents horizontal movement towards the left, which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the left arrow key.
      private boolean moveRight
      Boolean that represents horizontal movement towards the right, which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the right arrow key.
      private boolean moveUp
      Boolean that represents upward movement which is triggered upon KeyPressed or KeyReleased of the up arrow key.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InputHandler()
      The input handler does not require any initializations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      KeyPressed method sets movement booleans to true depending on the key pressed.
      void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      KeyReleased method sets movement booleans to false depending on the key that was initially pressed then released.
      void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Overridden KeyListener method, not implemented.
      boolean moveDown()
      Returns a boolean that represents movement in the down direction.
      boolean moveLeft()
      Returns a boolean that represents movement in the left direction.
      boolean moveRight()
      Returns a boolean that represents movement in the right direction.
      boolean moveUp()
      Returns a boolean that represents movement in the up direction.
      void setMoveDown(boolean moveDown)
      Sets boolean moveDown to true if key press event was a down arrow.
      void setMoveLeft(boolean moveLeft)
      Sets boolean moveLeft to true if key press event was a left arrow.
      void setMoveRight(boolean moveRight)
      Sets boolean moveRight to true if key press event was a right arrow.
      void setMoveUp(boolean moveUp)
      Sets boolean moveUp to true if key press event was an up arrow.

      • setMoveUp

        public void setMoveUp(boolean moveUp)
